Class ExternalEnvironmentInstaller

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.hkijena.jipipe.api.environments.ExternalEnvironmentInstaller
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Runnable, JIPipeRunnable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BasicMinicondaEnvPythonInstaller, BasicPortableEnvPythonInstaller, EasyInstallExternalEnvironmentInstaller, PythonPackageLibraryEnvironmentInstaller, REnvInstaller, SelectCondaEnvPythonInstaller, SelectSystemPythonInstaller, SelectVirtualEnvPythonInstaller

    public abstract class ExternalEnvironmentInstaller
extends Object
implements JIPipeRunnable
    Contains instructions to install an environment. Use JIPipeDocumentation to set the name and description for this installer
